markdownRemark.html: The museum is organised chronologically according to the history of Jaen, beginning with the prehistoric geography of the area, the advent of Neolithic man and the agrarian age, slowly segueing into Roman Spain, Moorish Spain and up to present day. There's a lot of large-scale models and even a reconstruction of a famous prehistoric tomb from the area, as well as plenty of artifacts, especially in the Roman section. Placards are in Spanish, but a brochure is available in English explaining the different sections of the museum.

frontmatter.title: Museo de Jaén
frontmatter.description: Museo de Jaén - The museum is organised chronologically according to the history of Jaen, beginning with the prehistoric geography of the area, the advent of Neolithic man and the agrarian age, slowly segueing into Roman Spain, Moorish Spain and up to present day.
frontmatter.price: Citizens of the EU enter free , other countries pay 1.50 euros.
